JOB DESCRIPTION:
We are looking to hire exceptional full time Senior ASP.net developer with the below skill set 



-  Proven expertise developing and implementing systems using ASP.net and Telerik controls 



-  Well versed with of Web 2.0 technologies  ( HTML 5,  CSS3,  Jquery,  JSON,  AJAX,  Dojo )  



-  Proven expertise with Databases :  MS SQL 2010,  Mongo DB,  Windows Azure 



-  Excellent grasp of object oriented programming,  object oriented design patterns and refactoring. 



-  A passion to be a part of a team that delivers fantastic stabile solutions 



-  Great communications skills,  both written and verbal,  and a healthy desire for collaboration 



-  A self starter with a good learning curve 



Roles and responsibility:  



The candidate would be working with the onsite team  ( in the US )  to develop applications using ASP.net ,  MS SQL 



He /  she would be directly co- ordinating with the client to get the functional requirements 



He/  She would be working in an Agile methodology of software development 



He /  She would be responsible for timely delivery of deliverables and making sure all milestones are met as per expectations
